hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Blue Rupee#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Strength Upgrade#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #the Kokiri Sword# can be found at #Gerudo Valley#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Blue Rupee#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that ##the Shadow Temple## has #3# major items.

GC (Maze).text: They say that crouch stabs mimic the effects of your last attack.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that plundering #the Ice Cavern# is a foolish choice.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that ##Hyrule Castle## has #2# major items.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that unfreezing #King Zora# grants #a Piece of Heart#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #Zora's River# is on the path to #the Tower#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that the #Light Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that a #pool of lava# in Goron City blocks the way to #3 Deku Scrubs#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #the Water Temple# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #Bombchus (20 pieces)#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Slingshot#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that winning the #treasure chest game# rewards #a Blue Rupee#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# is on the way of the hero.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #a Gold Skulltula Token# can be found in #Hyrule Field#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that shooting #the sun# grants #a Piece of Heart#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that Great Fairies outside #Hyrule and Ganon's castles# reward...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that a #storm within Zora's Domain# reveals a #generic grotto#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# is on the path to #Twinrova#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that lifting a #rock in the desert# reveals #ReDeads# guarding a chest.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that plundering #Goron City# is a foolish choice.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that in the #crater, a spider in a crate and a single scrub# guard...^ #a Heart Container# and #a Red Rupee#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #the Water Temple# is on the path to #Bongo Bongo#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# hoards #Saria's Song#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Underwater Left Chest

ZD (Mweep).text: Oh!^Oh-oh!^C'mon!^Come on! Come on! Come on!^HOT!!^What a hot beat!^WHOOOOAH!^YEEEEAH!^YAHOOO!!

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that plundering #the Gerudo Training Ground# is a foolish choice.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #a Gold Skulltula Token# can be found at #the Desert Colossus#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that ##Lake Hylia## has #4# major items.
